q1: With what they showed in terms of heart and determination, will Mexico ever have a chance of winning a world cup in the future?
a1: Only if they can beat their 5th game curse
q2: Mexico is definitely the best CONCACAF team!
a2: I agree only because Mexico is the only decent team in CONCACAF
q3: Do they have a chance in the next CONCACAF cup?
a3: They have a very good chance and I believe they can go for the win.
q4: who are their most formidable challengers likely to be?
a5: I think that Argentina would comfortably win that one
